title: Cranberry Jell-O Salad with Mandarin Oranges

Ingredients.2: 1 (15 ounce) can mandarin oranges, drained and chopped

Ingredients.5: 2 (3 ounce) packages cranberry-flavored gelatin mix (such as Jell-O®)

Directions.1: Place cranberries, mandarin oranges, and pecans into a food processor and pulse several times to chop; process mixture until finely ground, about 30 seconds. Transfer mixture into a large bowl.

Directions.2: Mix pineapple, gelatin, and sugar in a separate bowl. Add boiling water and cold water and stir together until gelatin and sugar have dissolved.

Directions.3: Pour gelatin mixture into cranberry mixture and stir. Pour into a gelatin mold and refrigerate, 8 hours or overnight, before serving.
